q: Failure is feedback. Learn from it and move on.
h:
“Failure is feedback. Learn from it and move on.” —
Jack Butcher

q: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
h:
“Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
h:
“Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.” —
Thomas Edison

q: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
h:
“Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more. ” —
Nikola Tesla

q: To succeed takes more than the desire to win. It also takes the acceptance that we could fail.
h:
“To succeed takes more than the desire to win. It also takes the acceptance that we could fail.” —
Simon Sinek

q: Failing is another stepping stone to greatness.
h:
“Failing is another stepping stone to greatness.” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
h:
“I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.” —
Thomas Edison

q: Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been.
h:
“Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been.” —
Ronald Reagan

q: The number one cause of failure is the fear of failure.
h:
“The number one cause of failure is the fear of failure.” —
Steve Harvey

q: A minute's success pays the failure of years.
h:
“A minute's success pays the failure of years.” —
Robert Browning

q: Winners are not people who never fail, but people who never quit.
h:
“Winners are not people who never fail, but people who never quit.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

q: If you set your goals ridiculously high and its a failure, you will fail above everyone elses success.
h:
“If you set your goals ridiculously high and its a failure, you will fail above everyone elses success.” —
James Cameron

q: Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.
h:
“Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.” —
Napoleon Hill

q: Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.
h:
“Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.” —
Les Brown

q: Zen insists that the whole trouble is just our failure to realize that there is no problem.
h:
“Zen insists that the whole trouble is just our failure to realize that there is no problem.” —
Bruce Lee

q: You can't let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you.
h:
“You can't let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you.” —
Barack Obama

q: All that a man achieves and all that he fails to achieve is the direct result of his own thoughts.
h:
“All that a man achieves and all that he fails to achieve is the direct result of his own thoughts.” —
James Allen

q: Don't be afraid of missing opportunities. Behind every failure is an opportunity somebody wishes they had missed.
h:
“Don't be afraid of missing opportunities. Behind every failure is an opportunity somebody wishes they had missed.” —
Lily Tomlin

q: Dream big and dare to fail.
h:
“Dream big and dare to fail.” —
Norman Vaughan

q: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
h:
“Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.” —
Winston Churchill

q: They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.
h:
“They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.” —
James Allen

q: Failure means you've now learned another valuable lesson that pushes you one step closer to success.
h:
“Failure means you've now learned another valuable lesson that pushes you one step closer to success.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
h:
“Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.” —
Winston Churchill

q: Most great people have achieved their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
h:
“Most great people have achieved their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.” —
Napoleon Hill

q: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
h:
“Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.” —
John Wooden

q: Success is never final; failure is never fatal.
h:
“Success is never final; failure is never fatal.” —
Conrad Hilton

q: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
h:
“Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Never feel shame for trying and failing, for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.
h:
“Never feel shame for trying and failing, for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.” —
Og Mandino

q: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
h:
“It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.” —
Herman Melville

q: Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker.
h:
“Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker. ” —
Zig Ziglar

q: Failure is just information and an opportunity to change your course.
h:
“Failure is just information and an opportunity to change your course.” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.
h:
“If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.” —
Woody Allen

q: There is no failure except in no longer trying. There is no defeat except from within, no insurmountable barrier except our own inherent weakness of purpose.
h:
“There is no failure except in no longer trying. There is no defeat except from within, no insurmountable barrier except our own inherent weakness of purpose.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: He who fails to plan, plans to fail.
h:
“He who fails to plan, plans to fail.” —
Unknown

q: Success and failure come and go, but don't let them define you. It's who you are that matters.
h:
“Success and failure come and go, but don't let them define you. It's who you are that matters.” —
Kamal Ravikant

q: Most people achieved their greatest success one step beyond what looked like their greatest failure.
h:
“Most people achieved their greatest success one step beyond what looked like their greatest failure.” —
Brian Tracy

q: Avoiding failure is to avoid progress.
h:
“Avoiding failure is to avoid progress.” —
Unknown

q: Failure is acceptable. Not trying is a whole different ball park.
h:
“Failure is acceptable. Not trying is a whole different ball park.” —
Michael Jordan

q: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
h:
“Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
h:
“Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.” —
Henry Ford

q: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
h:
“Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.” —
Dale Carnegie

q: Forget mistakes. Forget failure. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it. Today is your lucky day!
h:
“Forget mistakes. Forget failure. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it. Today is your lucky day!” —
Og Mandino

q: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, learning from failure.
h:
“There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, learning from failure.” —
Colin Powell

q: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
h:
“The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success. ” —
Paramahansa Yogananda

q: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
h:
“Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.” —
John Wooden

q: Good entrepreneurs don't fail because they stay at it.
h:
“Good entrepreneurs don't fail because they stay at it.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: Failure is a prerequisite for great success. If you want success faster, double your rate of failure.
h:
“Failure is a prerequisite for great success. If you want success faster, double your rate of failure.” —
Brian Tracy

q: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
h:
“The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.” —
Colin R. Davis

q: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
h:
“Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better. ” —
Samuel Beckett

q: A man is great not because he hasn't failed; a man is great because failure hasn't stopped him.
h:
“A man is great not because he hasn't failed; a man is great because failure hasn't stopped him.” —
Confucius
